column7: osiandɛ ɔasera me ngo dɛ membɛka nsɛmpa nkyerɛ ehiafo. Ɔasoma me dɛ membɛpaa ɔgye mma ndɔmmumfo
column9: na membɛgye hɔn a wɔretseetsee hɔn no

column4: na ɔtsenaa ase; na hɔn a wɔwɔ nhyiamudan mu hɔ nyina

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ ase kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Ndɛ na kyerɛw yi aba mu wɔ hom asowa mu."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: hom dze bɛ yi bobu me: Ɔsafo

column6: yɛ no wankasa wo kurow mu ha so."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Nkɔnhyɛnyi biara

column2: "Na meka no nokwar kyerɛ hom dɛ

column2: "naaso wɔannsoma Elija wɔ hɔn mu biara hɔ

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛnyi Elisha n’aber do no

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔwɔ nhyiamudan no mu nyina

column2: "Na ɔno dze
"Na ɔkɔr Galilii kurow bi a wɔfrɛ no Karpernaum mu. Nna ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ hɔn fa ahomgyeda no ho;"
"na ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛɛ hɔn ahobow
"Na nyimpa bi wɔ nhyiamudan no mu a ɔwɔ sunsum fi
column3: na ɔdze ndze kɛse kaa mu dɛ"

column2: "Aa! Ebɛnadze na yɛnye wo wɔ yɛ
column3: Jesus Nazarɛtnyi? Ana ebae dɛ erebɛsɛɛ hɛn? Minyim wo nyimpaban
column4: Nyankopɔn no Hotseweenyi no."

column2: "Na Jesus bɔɔ no ham see dɛ

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn nyina ahobow
column4: Ebɛn asɛm nye yi
column5: dɛɔdze tum nye ahoɔdzen hyɛ esunsum fi ma wotu kɔ?"

column2: "Na no ho asɛm tahyee aman a woetwa ehyia hɔ no nkurow nyina mu."

column4: "#4.38 PAPU: Dɛm yarba yi na ndɛ wɔka dɛ fiiba no."

column2: "Na okegyinaa no do tseaa yarba no

column2: "Na wi rokɔtɔ no
column3: hɔn a wɔwɔ ayarfo a yarba horow rehaw hɔn nyina dze hɔn brɛɛ no
column4: ma ɔdze ne nsa too hɔn nyina do nkorkor yɛɛ hɔn edur."

column2: "Na mbɔnsam so fii dodowara mu firii
column3: na wɔkaa mu kɛse see dɛ
column4: Ɔwo nye Nyankopɔn Ba no. Na ɔbɔɔ hɔn ham
column5: na ɔamma hɔn kwan dɛ wɔnkasa
column6: osiandɛ wonyim dɛ ɔno nye Kraest no."

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: osii mu kɔr sar bi do
column4: na nyimpadodow no hwehwɛɛ no
column6: wosiankaa no dɛ mma ommfi hɔn nkyɛn nnkɔ."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Otwar dɛ meka Nyankopɔn ahenman ho nsɛmpa kyerɛ nkurow bi so
column4: osiandɛ iyi ntsi na wɔsomaa me."

column2: "Na ɔkɛkaa asɛm no wɔ Judea  nhyiamudan mu."
column3: "#4.44 JUDEA: Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom ka dɛ Galilii."
